originalText.text: I couldn’t have asked to be taught by a better school and instructor. (Gabby) was very patient and welcoming. It was a comforting atmosphere. I also had two lessons with (Willy) who was also a great instructor. I passed my road test on the first try. Thanks to the team at excellent truck & auto driving…. I would 100% recommend especially to fellow students who can receive a discount on packages.

text.text: I couldn’t have asked to be taught by a better school and instructor. (Gabby) was very patient and welcoming. It was a comforting atmosphere. I would 100% recommend especially to fellow students who can receive a discount on packages.

originalText.text: Every thing about this driving school stands out from the others in the area! New clean cars, Instructors (shout out to Willy and Gabby) are amazing and patient. Great customer service from the front staff, they are nice and answered all the questions I had. I only took 3 lessons and passed my road test on the first try, and that was the first time I touched a car. Again I recommend this school to anyone actually trying to get their licenses.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of attending Excellent Driving School, and I couldn't be happier with my experience. The level of service provided by both the instructors and the front desk staff was truly exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcome and valued as a student. They were friendly, knowledgeable, and went above and beyond to ensure that all my questions were answered and that I had all the information I needed.

The driving instructors at Excellent Driving School are highly skilled professionals who are passionate about teaching and guiding their students. They provided me with excellent instruction, tailored to my individual needs, and helped me develop the confidence and skills necessary for safe and responsible driving. Additionally, I was impressed by the comprehensive CDL classes offered at the school. These classes are designed to equip aspiring commercial truck drivers with the knowledge and skills required for success in their careers. The instructors were thorough and dedicated, ensuring that every aspect of the CDL requirements was covered.

I highly recommend Excellent Driving School to anyone looking for a top-notch driving education. Their exceptional service, knowledgeable instructors, and comprehensive programs make them an outstanding choice. Thank you, Excellent Driving School, for providing an excellent learning experience that has made me a better and more confident driver.

originalText.text: I had a phenomenal experience with Excellent Driving School. The instructors in Harlem are not only experts in their field but also genuinely care about your success. I couldn't have asked for a better driving school to learn from!

originalText.text: Respectful and professional teachers. I recommend this place 100 percent because they have a lot of patience with you, very professional and respectful. I love this place.
